main.name: Meenakshi Lodhi
main.description: I can sum up my entire personal and professional life in three words - I CAN WIN
main.bio: Myself Meenakshi.I  belong to UP. I have done my B.sc. 𝘾𝙤𝙢𝙥𝙪𝙩𝙚𝙧 science with highest aggregate percentage throughout my School & college academics .  I also got alumni award. During my academics, I have participated in various sports activities and also got first prizes there .  I am also a gold medalist in many competitions.I love to work as an individual contributor as well as along with the team. In my free time, I compose poetry & make crafts with waste materials  to manage free time efficiently. I agree that I love to work hard, but I am also a social butterfly .I love Sports, Yoga, classical Dance (Katthak ) & Painting. I have represented my  college in LIC  & Hindustan Olympiad in 2019 and where I got the title of District Topper of 2019. I took part in workshop of cyber Security conducted by RBI and Central Government.

education.college: D.N. College Meerut affliated to CCS University
education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours with higest percentage in college

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, JsonWebToken
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, Blogging Site, with my teammates  Ishaan Mangal, Atul Yadav and Subhajeet Banerjee.This is a group project where we had to create API's for resgistering a user as a Author login of user with JWT Token for authentication purpose and has has worked on authorization for creating blogs, getting list of blogs, updation and deletion of the blogs.

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript
work.description: OPEN TO INTERN PROJECT, with my teammates Prital Rupnur, Jyoti Kumari and Bhuwan Singh Samant. In this project we basically managed the students who want to apply for the interns in a particular college. There we introduced 3 #apis and have done the authentication, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs .

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript, AWS S3, JWT, Multer
work.description: We have successfully completed our project,Book 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗦𝘆𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗺, with my teammates Debashish Behra, Priyanka Panda, Rohan Kumar. In this project we basically managed the user, the books and the rewiew which can be given the guest or a genuine user. There we introduced 10 #apis and have done the #CRUD_operations, validations using different functions which was executed by mongodb and nodejs and have also introduced the authentication and authorization

work.title: Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Javascript, Redis
work.description: We have successfully completed our project, url Shortner, with my teammates Aman Kumar Mahto, Ghanshyam chhatriya, and mohmmad Vaseem. In this project we basically have to shorten the long Url's and then we also have used #redis to save the particular link in cache memory or to minimize the database call . There we introduced 2 #apis that was defined #express #router function mongodb and nodejs ..

work.title: Javascript, Nodejs, MongoDB, Express, Bycrypt, JsonWebToken, AWS S3
work.description: We have successfully completed our 5th Project, Shopping Cart, with my teammates Rupali Kumari, Shivanshi Panday & Mohd Abass Hasan. In this project we basically have added 4 features namely User, Product , Cart and Order.

work.title: using css, html and Javascript
work.description: Multi Page University Website Design which is completely based on HTML, CSS and Javascript. In this project ,I  have created a five different web pages and all this web pages have been linked through a Navigation Menu.To maintain my Coaching Centre data digitally and provide online classes and study material by using HTML CSS, JAVASCRIPT,

testimonials.text: We will change the World with Technology
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
